meanings.definition: cowiest: superlative form of cow, meaning most like a cow
meanings.sent1: The cowiest cow in the field had the biggest spots.
meanings.sent2: She wore the cowiest costume at the farm-themed party.
meanings.sent3: The cowiest toy in the store was a plush cow with a bell around its neck.
meanings.sent4: Her room was decorated in the cowiest way possible, with cow-print curtains and a cow-shaped lamp.
meanings.sent5: The cowiest sound on the farm was the gentle mooing of the cows in the pasture.

meanings.definition: cowiest: superlative form of cow, meaning most characteristic of a cow
meanings.sent1: The cowiest milk came from the black and white cow.
meanings.sent2: The cowiest smell in the barn was a mix of hay and manure.
meanings.sent3: The cowiest moment of the day was when the farmer milked the cows at sunrise.
meanings.sent4: Her painting captured the cowiest essence of the peaceful grazing cows in the meadow.
meanings.sent5: The cowiest sight on the farm was the newborn calf taking its first wobbly steps.
